products.product_name: The Body Shop Hemp Hand Protector
products.category: Health & Beauty > Personal Care > Foot Care > Foot Odor Removers
products.description: Hemp Hand Protector - The Body Shop difference: Hemp Hand Protector will soften and protect hands, even after washing. The Body Shop's best-selling Hemp Hand Protector is dermatologically tested for very dry skin contains Community Fair Trade hemp seed oil. Hemp seed oil contains unusually high concentrations of essential fatty acids that repair skin's moisture barrier, so skin is smooth and supple. Community Fair Trade bees wax also is a great moisturizer and conditions skin. It acts as a barrier to seal in moisture. Best for very dry skin. 100% Vegetarian, Never Tested on Animals, Support Community Fair Trade Ingredients, No Sulfates, No Phthalates, No GMOs, No Triclosan - Hemp Hand Protector.
